arts.ttl: Benjamin Sesko and £51m ace join as 17-year-old changes role - Kai Havertz's Arsenal issue
arts.sum: Kai Havertz looked to be the final piece of the Arsenal puzzle last season, but the Arsenal forward could soon find himself playing second fiddle

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart stage thrilling comeback to defeat nine-man RB Leipzig
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart came from behind to defeat RB Leipzig 2-1 in a thrilling encounter which saw goalscorer Benjamin Šeško and Loïs Openda sent off for the visitors. Chris Führich and Deniz Undav both had opportunities to level the score, but their efforts ultimately failed to find the back of the net and, despite their increased pressure, Stuttgart went into the half-time break trailing 1-0.

arts.ttl: 20:30 kick offs: Leipzig implosion, late madness in Bremen, Union Berlin and Hoffenheim beaten comfortably
arts.sum: On a hectic night across the Bundesliga, a resurgent Stuttgart overcame a Leipzig side imploding from the inside, Heidenheim rescued a point in a moment of madness at Weserstadion, whilst Bayern München and Augsburg comfortably saw off Hoffenheim and Union Berlin.

arts.ttl: Bayern win race to sign Tom Bischof
arts.sum: Bayern München have reportedly won the race to sign Tom Bischof on a free transfer from TSG Hoffenheim.

arts.ttl: Report: Why Benjamin Sesko's stance over Arsenal move could change this month
arts.sum: Arsenal have just been told that Benjamin Sesko’s stance over leaving RB Leipzig could change this month if one thing were to happen. Arsenal tried...

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig’s André Silva a potential candidate for West Ham
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that RB Leipzig striker André Silva is currently a candidate for West Ham as they look for a backup to replace the now-injured Niclas Füllkrug. Silva is only…

arts.ttl: January transfer news and rumours: Elye Wahi to West Ham, Devyne Rensch to Everton, Leipzig to cancel Noah Okafor deal
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Elye Wahi to West Ham, Devyne Rensch to Everton, and an update on Noah Okafor.

arts.ttl: Okafor’s Failed Move to Leipzig Complicates Milan’s Pursuit of Rashford
arts.sum: In an unexpected turn of events, Noah Okafor's proposed transfer to RB Leipzig has fallen through, throwing AC Milan's transfer plans into disarray. The German club made a last-minute decision to back out of the deal after medical examinations raised concerns about the player's physical condition. The post Okafor’s Failed Move to Leipzig Complicates Milan’s Pursuit of Rashford appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart vs RB Leipzig preview: European contenders clash in huge encounter
arts.sum: In a match that could have serious implications on the race for European football, VfB Stuttgart host RB Leipzig at MHPArena.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig cancel Okafor transfer from Milan
arts.sum: Sky Sport reports that RB Leipzig have cancelled Noah Okafor’s proposed loan transfer from Milan...
